hadiths.text: Narrated Habib ibn Maslamah: The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) used to give a quarter of the booty as reward after the fifty had been kept off, and a third after the fifth had been kept off when he returned

chapter.ara-name: باب فِيمَنْ قَالَ الْخُمُسُ قَبْلَ النَّفْلِ
chapter.eng-name: Regarding Whoever Said That The Khumus Is Before The Nafl
